channel.title: tidyquant on Demo website
channel.description: Recent content in tidyquant on Demo website

item.title: Create awesome pivot table with R
item.description: Libraries tidyverse A collection of lots of tidy packages from Rstudio, e.g. ggplot2, dplyr, stringr, purrr, forcat … tidyquant A package integrated the quantitative analysis functionality of zoo, xts, quantmod, TTR, and PerformanceAnalytics, in a tidy way. gt A package for creating attractive tables. library(tidyverse) library(tidyquant) library(DT) library(gt) You can check the functions in a package by ls("package:pkgname"). For example.
